page.title: 06Boy Scouts
page.content: Tuesday is Scout night. I go to the 2nd Banbury Group, because there is not a scout pack on the Bretch Hill Estate. We wear a uniform which is a green shirt, oak coloured trousers with a belt, green beret, and a neckerchief. The neckerchiefs are two coloured and each group has its own colours. Scouts start at age 11 and goes on until 16 when you can become a Venture Scout. At scouts we work to get badges. There are many sorts such as the computer, cycling, camping, and sportsman badge. At pack meetings we also play games and somtimes visit other places such as the police station Each Summer we have a pack holiday. This year we are camping in Warwickshire.
